channel.title: Comments on: SQL Saturday Pensacola – Measure of success
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tim Radney
item.dc:creator: Tim Radney
item.description: Just came across this blog. It was great meeting you too and loved the fact the wife was able to see there are folks more addicted to SQL Server than myself. She thought I had issues with stickers on my laptop. LOL Hope to see you at the Summit and other SQL Sats.
item.content:encoded: Just came across this blog. It was great meeting you too and loved the fact the wife was able to see there are folks more addicted to SQL Server than myself. She thought I had issues with stickers on my laptop. LOL Hope to see you at the Summit and other SQL Sats.

item.title: By: Julie Smith
item.dc:creator: Julie Smith
item.description: I love the Florida SQL Saturdays, especially during the Winter!
item.content:encoded: I love the Florida SQL Saturdays, especially during the Winter!

item.title: By: SQLArcher
item.dc:creator: SQLArcher
item.description: I agree. I was lucky enough to be accepted to speak at SQLSat 83, which is also the very first SQLSat in Africa. The feeling of being able to help fellow DBA's with past experiences is very hard to beat. Definately an accomplishment.
item.content:encoded: I agree. I was lucky enough to be accepted to speak at SQLSat 83, which is also the very first SQLSat in Africa. The feeling of being able to help fellow DBA’s with past experiences is very hard to beat. Definately an accomplishment.
